welcome_message_body: Welcome to Brixton, a vibrant and diverse neighborhood known for its lively markets, street art, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy exploring all that Brixton has to offer and have a wonderful time during your visit!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private jet passengers, offering exclusive amenities and services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport. No password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to VIP and private charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The original terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and its partners.

wifi.note: Free for the first hour, then charges apply for longer usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private flights and charters.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's largest terminal and handles flights from a variety of airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's second largest terminal and handles flights from a variety of airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
